verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: will] spend much of the summer and the fall campaigning for Republican candidates while Senate leaders will try to keep Democrats in D.C.

President Donald Trump will spend much of the summer and the fall campaigning for Republican candidates while Senate leaders [V: will] try to keep Democrats in D.C.
